dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1489 IH: SNAP Back Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Crawford introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 to repeal the drug felon ban for participation in the supplemental nutrition assistance program under the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the SNAP Back Act of 2023.

section.header: Repeal of denial of SNAP benefits for certain drug-related convictions

subsection.text: Section 115 of the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 (21 U.S.C. 862a) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading by striking and benefits,

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1) by striking , or at the end and inserting a period,
by striking for— and all that follows through (1), and inserting for, and
in the heading by striking and Benefits for Others and all that follows through families, and

paragraph.text: in subsection (c) by striking or benefits, and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1) by striking , and at the end and inserting a period,
by striking it— and all that follows through (1), and inserting it, and

subsection.text: The Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 is amended in the table of contents by striking the item relating to section 115 and inserting the following:

toc.toc-entry: Sec. 115. Denial of assistance for certain drug-related convictions..
